wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Griffiths (born 30 November 1881, date of death unknown) was a British cyclist. He competed in two events at the 1912 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1912 Summer Olympics

response: *Arthur Griffiths (footballer, born 1879) (1879–1955), footballer for Bristol Rovers and Notts County
*Arthur Griffiths (footballer, born 1885) (1885–1944), footballer for Stoke City and Oldham
*Arthur Griffiths (footballer, born 1908) (1914–1995), footballer for Torquay, Rochdale and Stoke City
*Arthur Griffiths (businessman) (born 1957), Canadian businessman, philanthropist, and former candidate for political office
